quest.name: Bhoot Camps
journal:
Eshana seems unusually skittish.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Search the designated locations, subdue impure bhoots, then purify your targets using sanctified saltwater.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Forename, you could not have come at a better time! We have need of a champion─a brave hero who ssstands firm in the face of faceless horror!

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: There have been reportsss of bhootsss, Forename, and my sssisters at Vira Nilya have tasssked usss with exorcising these ragged ssspecters.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Here. Make your way to the Ssstriped Hills. Sssubdue any bhootsss you encounter, then douse them with this sssanctified sssaltwater. Be thorough.

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: ...Are they gone? You didn't...touch them, did you?

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: Ananta legend has it that those who ssso much as brush the rags of a bhoot will be cursssed. Your hair will melt away, your ssscales rot, and your eyes fade to a milky white...

dialogue.name: ESHANA
dialogue.text: For we who cherish beauty above all elssse, the very thought of sssuch pessstilent phantoms is nauseating. I truly appreciate you carrying out this dissstasteful tasssk on our behalf.
